messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Comrades, berlin is surrounded, by tomarrow, we will win space worl war 3

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to The USSR. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Quarter Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Come down to the bar for a pre-shuttle party, we got some good shit from botany and yours truly

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.
